title: Charlize Theron just completely transformed her hair with a new bowl cut
text:
Charlize Theron has been a bit of a hair chameleon throughout the years, and now she has a look totally different from her last.

On Instagram, she posted a photo of herself with two tank tops on and a brand new bowl haircut. In the caption she wrote, "She’s baaaaack #Fast9" referring to her upcoming role in the "Fast & Furious" franchise.

Theron's hair is also lighter than the deep brunette shade she originally had, and it has blonde highlights.

Since posting, Theron's post has received more than 353,000 likes, with many people making comments such as "This hair is next level good" and "Gorgeous!"

"I was inspired by early images of Linda Evangelista shot by @therealpeterlindbergh," hairstylist Adir Abergel wrote in a post about the new look he created for Theron. "It took some rad people to make this one come to life."

While this is a fresh new look for Theron, we're sure it won't be her last.

In the meantime, let's take a walk down memory lane looking at her ever-changing hair looks.

In April, the award-winning actress posed in a blazer and polka dot shirt with a cropped wavy brunette bob.

Theron posted a throwback from her first modeling competition in South Africa, wearing a head full of medium-length loose blonde curls.

For a photo shoot with Elle, Theron rocked a short sleek blonde style.

Theron poses on set in 2017 with a fun ponytail.

Theron sported a buzz cut in 2014 while on set for "Mad Max: Fury Road."
description: Charlize Theron surprises everyone with a brand new bowl haircut.
